key.name: dx
key.description: Scripts to exclude from dictionary break

type.name: strict
type.description: CSS level 3 line-break=strict, e.g. treat CJ as NS

type.name: normal
type.description: CSS level 3 line-break=normal, e.g. treat CJ as ID, break before hyphens for ja,zh

key.name: lw
key.description: Line break key for CSS lev 3 word-break options

type.name: normal
type.description: CSS lev 3 word-break=normal, normal script/language behavior for midword breaks

type.name: breakall
type.description: CSS lev 3 word-break=break-all, allow midword breaks unless forbidden by lb setting

type.name: keepall
type.description: CSS lev 3 word-break=keep-all, prohibit midword breaks except for dictionary breaks

type.name: phrase
type.description: Prioritize keeping natural phrases (of multiple words) together when breaking, used in short text like title and headline

key.name: ss
key.description: Sentence break parameter key to control use of suppressions data

type.name: standard
type.description: Use segmentation suppressions data of type standard
